item.description:
A meetup for a good cause - come out and support Jenny in her fundraising efforts for MS and at the same time meet some great people from the nightlife group! We will meet at the Kinsale Irish Pub this Thursday, around 6:30pm. The Kinsale is behind the Gov't Center T stop, on the other side of Cambridge Street. A contribution would be much appreciated - you can give in person or online at the link below. Any questions/directions, please all me at 646.541.0708. Thanks and see you Thursday! Charlie

In Jenny's own words....

When I registered for the Dean Team Automotive MS Challenge Walk, I took on not one, but two significant challenges: to complete the rigorous event, and to raise money funding services and research for the fight against multiple sclerosis. At some point during the Dean Team MS Challenge Walk, my feet might ache or I might feel tired, but my thoughts will never be far from those who must every day fight the fatigue, immobility, and other symptoms of multiple sclerosis.

That's why I'm asking you to support my fund raising efforts with a tax deductible donation.

It's faster and easier than ever to support this cause that's so important to me. Simply click on the link at the bottom of this message.

Any amount, great or small, helps to make a difference in the lives of people with MS. I appreciate your support and look forward to letting you know how I do.

Click here to visit my personal page:
http://www.nationalms...

P.S. If you would like more information about the National Multiple Sclerosis Society, how proceeds from the Dean Team MS Walk are used, or the other ways you can get involved in the fight against MS, please visit nationalmssociety.org.

2007 Dean Team MS Challenge Walk
3 Days. 50 Miles. Closer to a cure.
June 1 - 3, 2007

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Jenny's Mixer Supporting the National MS Society - This Thursday!
